[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I verify my email address in Concur?'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I verify my email address in Concur?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'To verify your email address in Concur, follow these steps: 1. Select the Profile icon, and then select Profile Settings. 2. In the Profile Settings menu, select Email Addresses. 3. In the Email Addresses section, look for Travel Arrangers/Delegates. 4. To verify your email address, select Verify. In the Verification Email Sent popup window, select OK. 5. Check your email for a verification code sent by SAP Concur. 6. Enter the code in the Enter Code field and select OK. You can copy and paste the code into the Enter Code field. This process ensures your email address is verified for activities like emailing receipts for expense reports.'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I verify my email address in Concur?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'To verify your email address in Concur, follow these steps: 1. This process ensures your email address is verified for activities like emailing receipts for expense reports.'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'Can you explain how to add a delegate in Concur and what permissions they need?'}]
[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is the process to verify an email address for a delegate?'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is the process to verify an email address for a delegate?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'The process to verify an email address for a delegate is as follows: 

1. Select the Profile icon and then Profile Settings. 
2. Select Email Addresses in the Profile Settings. 
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Travel Arrangers/Delegates. 
4. Select Verify next to your email address, and then select OK in the Verification Email Sent pop-up window. 
5. Enter the code sent by SAP Concur into the Enter Code field and select OK. 

After both you and your delegate have successfully verified your email addresses, the delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com with the attached receipt images. Only the user’s verified email address should be entered in the Subject line. The emailed images will appear in the Available Receipts library of your profile.'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is the process to verify an email address for a delegate?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'The process to verify an email address for a delegate is as follows: 

1. Select the Profile icon and then Profile Settings. 
2. Select Email Addresses in the Profile Settings. 
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Travel Arrangers/Delegates. 
4. Select Verify next to your email address, and then select OK in the Verification Email Sent pop-up window. 
5. Enter the code sent by SAP Concur into the Enter Code field and select OK. 

After both you and your delegate have successfully verified your email addresses, the delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com with the attached receipt images. Only the user’s verified email address should be entered in the Subject line. The emailed images will appear in the Available Receipts library of your profile.'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I assign different levels of permissions to a new delegate after adding them?'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is the process to verify an email address for a delegate?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'The process to verify an email address for a delegate is as follows: 

1. Select the Profile icon and then Profile Settings. 
2. Select Email Addresses in the Profile Settings. 
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Travel Arrangers/Delegates. 
4. Select Verify next to your email address, and then select OK in the Verification Email Sent pop-up window. 
5. Enter the code sent by SAP Concur into the Enter Code field and select OK. 

After both you and your delegate have successfully verified your email addresses, the delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com with the attached receipt images. Only the user’s verified email address should be entered in the Subject line. The emailed images will appear in the Available Receipts library of your profile.'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I assign different levels of permissions to a new delegate after adding them?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'To assign different levels of permissions to a new delegate after adding them, follow these steps: 

1. Select the Profile icon, then select Profile Settings.
2. On the Profile Options page, select Expense Delegates.
3. From the Delegates tab, select Add to add a new delegate.
4. Search for and select a delegate by employee name, email address, or login ID, and then select Add.
5. Assign permissions to the new delegate using the appropriate check box(es). To allow a delegate to email receipts into a user’s Available Receipts library, make sure to select the Can View Receipts check box.
6. Once you have assigned all the necessary permissions, select Save.'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'What is the process to verify an email address for a delegate?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'The process to verify an email address for a delegate is as follows: 

1. Select the Profile icon and then Profile Settings. 
2. Select Email Addresses in the Profile Settings. 
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Travel Arrangers/Delegates. 
4. Select Verify next to your email address, and then select OK in the Verification Email Sent pop-up window. 
5. Enter the code sent by SAP Concur into the Enter Code field and select OK. 

After both you and your delegate have successfully verified your email addresses, the delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com with the attached receipt images. Only the user’s verified email address should be entered in the Subject line. This step is necessary to enable features such as email receipt submission by a delegate.'}, {'role': 'user', 'content': 'How do I verify my email address to allow my delegate to email receipts on my behalf in SAP Concur?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': 'To verify your email address to allow your delegate to email receipts on your behalf in SAP Concur, follow these steps:
1. Select the Profile icon and then select Profile Settings.
2. On the Profile Options page, select Email Addresses.
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Verify next to your email address.
4. You will receive a verification code sent to your email. Enter this code in the Enter Code field and select OK.
5. Your email address is now verified. Your delegate will need to follow similar steps to verify their email address.
6. After both email addresses are verified, your delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com by entering your verified email address in the subject line. The sent receipt images will appear in the Available Receipts library of your profile.'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'How should a delegate send receipt images on my behalf?'}]

[{'role': 'user', 'content': 'How should a delegate send receipt images on my behalf?'}, {'role': 'system', 'content': "To enable a delegate to send receipt images on your behalf, follow these steps: First, add the delegate by going to Profile Settings -> Expense Delegates -> Add, and then search for the delegate by their employee name, email address, or login ID. Assign the necessary permissions to the delegate, ensuring that the 'Can View Receipts' checkbox is selected. Both you and the delegate must verify your email addresses in your respective Profile Settings and email accounts. Once verified, the delegate can email receipts to receipts@concur.com with the attached receipt images. Ensure that the subject line of the email contains only your verified email address. The emailed receipt images will appear in your Available Receipts library."}]

Both you and the delegate must verify your email addresses in your respective Profile Settings and email accounts. 1. Select the Profile icon, then select Profile Settings.
2. In the Profile Settings menu, select Email Addresses.
3. In the Email Addresses section, select Travel Arrangers/Delegates (if applicable).
4. Next to your email address, select Verify. A verification email will be sent to your address.
5. Open the verification email sent by SAP Concur, locate the code included in the email, and copy it.
6. Return to the Concur window, enter the verification code in the Enter Code field, and select OK.

After both you and your delegate have successfully verified your email addresses, the delegate will be able to email receipts on your behalf to receipts@concur.com.'}]
